title: Digital workplace solution for a leader in employee engagement and productivity
description: Symphony modernized a 15-year-old legacy digital product for a private equity-backed leader in employee engagement and productivity, resulting in a scalable and secure solution

title: An enterprise platform for venture incubation management
description: Digitized the incubation process with a simplified and scalable infrastructure for Mach49

title: A blockchain platform for a martial arts sports league
description: Designed and built an AWS-based blockchain platform with novel governance utility token mechanism for Karate Combat

description: Symphony digitalized an order management process for a private equity-backed in-vehicle storage manufacturer, streamlining every aspect of the B2B customer workflow

description: Symphony transformed a global heavy industry giant through legacy modernization, diversifying its offer and kicking off digital transformation to maintain its leading position

description: Symphony developed a multi-vendor marketplace that allowed third-party vendors to sell products through the client’s platform

description: Symphony built a wiki-style community hub for a private equity-backed  e-commerce retailer of pickup truck accessories to help them drive customer engagement and increase sales

title: Efficient practice management system solution for a veterinary group
description: Symphony developed a practice management system for a private equity-backed veterinary group, integrating multi-source reporting and analytics to provide data-driven, real-time insights
